markdownPage.content:
<!-- header: participate_header -->
<!-- solution_image: ./participate_main.png -->
<!-- howItWorksMain: participate_main
howItWorks: [participate_sec1, participate_sec2, participate_sec3] -->
<!-- header_title: HOW IT WORKS
header_image: ./participate_header.png
header_altImg: participate_header
header_excerpt: Farmers can be compared to Bitcoin Miners because they earn rewards for providing hardware to the networks. The main diﬀerence is that Miners essentially waste their hardware capacity to solve riddles that oﬀer no beneﬁt outside of the Bitcoin ecosystem, Farmers provide capacity in the form of storage, network and compute, that can be used by anyone. -->
<!-- comparisonMain: participate_comparison_main
comparisonSecs:
  [participate_comparison1, participate_comparison2, participate_comparison3] -->
markdownPage.header_excerpt: 800 USD. Currently Sold Out. Plug & Earn nodes don't require any technical knowledge to set up. An electricity outlet, internet connection, and a 3Node are all you need to start earning.

howItWorks.title: Simple and Secure
howItWorks.excerpt: No technical knowledge required. Comes pre-installed with Zero OS which automatically registers your node's capacity on the grid for people to use and helps to ensure security for your customers.

howItWorks.title: Performance meets Price
howItWorks.excerpt: The team has designed this node with an eye on performance while ensuring an affordable entry point for all. The specs include: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G, 32 GB RAM, 480 GB SSD, & 1 TB HDD.

howItWorks.title: Fits in Any Home or Office
howItWorks.excerpt: The Titan V2 is no larger than a shoebox, making it a perfect fit for nearly any location. Its dimensions are 155 MM width by 155 MM height by 80 MM depth.

features.title: Simply Plug & Farm
features.excerpt: All you need to get started is electricity, a network connection, and a 3Node.

features.title: Offer Capacity
features.excerpt: By connecting your 3Node, you provide decentralized storage and compute capacity for edge workloads.

features.title: Decentralize the Internet
features.excerpt: Join a participatory economy that brings a more performant, secure and sustainable Internet owned by everyone.

features.title: Connect the World
features.excerpt: Bring capacity to new locations and enable a more accessible and affordable solution to connect the unconnected.

features.title: Make Data Safe
features.excerpt: ThreeFold's technology allows real security. End-to-end encryption. Zero middlemen. Zero backdoors. A new age of security has arrived.

features.title: Earn Passive Income
features.excerpt: Take part in the largest and most valuable economy in the world, the internet.

cta.title: Reserve your 3Node
cta.excerpt: Right now we're sold out, but you can already reserve your spot in the next batch for Q1 2021. Spots are limited. Dive in to see which 3Node is best for you.
